other_tests.findings: Pale bladder mucosa with evidence of extrinsic compression; no distinct intraluminal nodularity.
Mass involving the dome of the bladder, posterior bladder wall, seminal vesicles, and prostate.

other_tests.procedure_name: Radical cystectomy and ileal conduit urinary diversion
other_tests.findings: Moderate lateral fixation of the mass; thickened bladder wall infiltrated by fibrous tissue.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At follow-up 7 years postoperatively, the patient was asymptomatic with normal blood urea nitrogen and creatinine.
